div.noscript: Please enable Javascript when viewing video pages.

td.br:
Dear Parents:
As we return to remote learning, I want to make it very clear how important it is for all students to complete and turn in their assignments. We are presently in the fourth marking period and report cards for the third marking period will be mailed for Schools No. 1 through No. 4 on Friday, April 24th. Schools No. 5, No. 6, Middle School, and High School report cards will be available on Parent Portal.

td.a: Delta Sigma Theta Sorority Supports Winslow Families

img.br: Winslow Township School District would like to thank Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, NJ Garden City Alumni Chapter, for giving large baskets of food to eight families in the Winslow Township School District. We also would like to thank the Sorority for their generosity and thoughtfulness during this time of need for many of our families.
The Winslow Township Board of Education is accepting letters of interest to fill a Board Member vacancy.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; text-align: justify;
margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; text-align: justify;
margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; text-align: justify;
margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; text-align: justify;
p.span: As we return to remote learning, I want to make it very clear how important it is for all students to complete and turn in their assignments. We are presently in the fourth marking period and report cards for the third marking period will be mailed for Schools No. 1 through No. 4 on Friday, April 24th. Schools No. 5, No. 6, Middle School, and High School report cards will be available on Parent Portal. Parents who do not have access to Parent Portal, may go to their school’s website and register for an access code. Report cards for Schools No. 5, No. 6, Middle School, and High School will be mailed by request only.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; text-align: justify;
margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; text-align: justify;
p.span: If you want your child(ren) to be promoted to the next grade or meet the requirements for graduation, he or she must earn that right by completing their assignments and receiving a passing grade from their teachers. We understand that this crisis has created some hardships for many of you; some have more challenges than others. If you are experiencing a situation that has prevented your child(ren) from completing their assignments, I encourage you to let your teachers or principals know immediately. Do not wait until June, by then it will be too late.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; text-align: justify;
margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; text-align: justify;
p.span: We want all of our students to succeed, however, in order for this to happen, we must work together. We are here for you and if there is a need, please let us know.
